definition.label: Gradient
definition.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

settings.content: Use when the font you want is not in shopify's defalut font

settings.label: ISO Codes RTL languages:
settings.info: List out language ISO codes to automatically switch to RTL layout: ar:(Arabic); ha:(Hausa), dv:(Dhivehi,Maldivian)

settings.label: Default country selection
settings.info: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.
